posts.post_content:
I am taking offers on these following cards:


N162 Glasscock PSA 4 $1500
N28 Bennett SGC 60 $750
N172 Pete Wood throwing SGC 80 $600
N162 Andrews SGC 30 crease free (speck loss) $400
N172 Seery bat standing (dark rich contrast) SGC 60 $550
N172 John O'Brien bat SGC 40 superb appeal clean back $450
N172 California Brown SGC 80  $700
N172 Geiss SGC 60 $500

Thanks
Jason
You might help yourself immensely if you decide to actually put prices on your cards. Most people, myself included, don't have time to figure out what a good offer would be. Just a thought....

...or are inclined to spend the time to figure it out if they have it.

Good luck with your sale!
Beautiful cards.

Beautiful cards, Jason!

I agree w/Leon & Jeff, even if you put 25% markup over "market rate" it'll at least let some collectors know if its an affordable card for their budget.  

Good luck w/your sale - those OJs have amazing images and a couple of the others have brilliant colors!

Rob
:)

Thanks guys and sorry seemed to forgot to add pricing.  However, prices now added.  I did start these at auction with lower minimums, but would be glad to end these for any member if they have no bids.


Jason
